comment: Excellent professor. Can tell she's new to this but did an excellent job teaching material that can be complex. Lots of things to be graded on so don't sweat. Well structured paper which takes the whole semester, however the assignments help you slowly build towards it so completing it is a breeze and unstressful.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: Very easy class, especially if you have already taken statistics. Professor Cease is kind and amazing at lecturing. Every concept makes sense. I would love to take another class with this professor! She very much cares about your success.

Professor Cease is a great professor! She is easily accessible to reach via email on any questions regarding the course work. We have Inquizitive HW's, Chapter quizzes, Tests, and a Research Paper. All were easy besides the test (though I should've done more studying on my part). Besides that, she is a great professor to take for Research in Psych.

Dr. Cease is an outstanding professor! She is kind, understanding, and provides detailed feedback that helps you learn and improve. Her explanations make complex topics easy to grasp, and she creates an inclusive, supportive environment. Highly recommend her for anyone looking for a professor who truly cares about student success!

She is kind, good at explaining difficult topics, and wicked smart when it comes to anything psychology-related. Textbook is free, 13 chapters, 12 quizzes, 3 major exams, one essay but it's written over the whole class, so it's not stressful. Great feedback, lenient grader, clear instructions. Would definitely recommend taking her.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr. Cease was so helpful to me! While you do have to read the textbook chapter a week in advance to take the quiz, you will still learn something from her lectures. She is a lenient grader and is super nice. There is some work to do, but just read the textbook, show up, and do the work. I reccomend asking her opinion on your papers in advance!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: Dr.Cease is a fair grader, most of the assignments are for participation and weekly inquizitive activities. To get an A; read the textbook, study, & come to class. This class is not made to be hard but was made so that we could genuinely learn the material, not just get a good grade. I loved her and hope to see her again in the future at KSU.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback
